Package boundary

Class RoomBoundary

  • java.lang.Object
    • boundary.RoomBoundary
  • public class RoomBoundary
extends java.lang.Object

    Room Boundary

    This class handles the display and printing of all Room information

    The related entity classes are: Room, Reservation.

    The related control class is: RoomControl.

    Since:
    13-04-2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sim Jun Kai

      • displayAllRoomDetails

        public static void displayAllRoomDetails​(Room p,
                                         java.lang.String input,
                                         java.lang.String inputS,
                                         java.lang.String rt,
                                         java.lang.String bt,
                                         java.lang.String fv,
                                         java.lang.String rs,
                                         int n)

        displayAllRoomDetails

        public static void displayAllRoomDetails(Room p, String input, String inputS, String rt, String bt, String fv, String rs, int n)

        This method display all room details(Room Number, Room type, WeekdayRate, WeekendRate, Wifi Enabled, Smoked Allowed, Bed Type, Facing View, Room Status)

        Parameters:
        p - - contains all the Room information
        input - - Specified the Wifi Enabled Input
        inputS - - Specified the Smoked Allowed Input
        rt - - Specified the Room Type
        bt - - Specified the Bed Type
        fv - - Specified the Facing View
        rs - - Specified the Room Status
        n - - Specified the Counter

      • displayAllRoomDetailsWithoutStatus

        public static void displayAllRoomDetailsWithoutStatus​(Room r1,
                                                      java.lang.String rt,
                                                      java.lang.String input,
                                                      java.lang.String inputS,
                                                      java.lang.String bt,
                                                      java.lang.String fv)

        displayAllRoomDetailsWithoutStatus

        public static void displayAllRoomDetailsWithoutStatus(Room r1, String input, String inputS, String rt, String bt, String fv)

        This method display all room details except room status(Room Number, Room type, WeekdayRate, WeekendRate, Wifi Enabled, Smoked Allowed, Bed Type, Facing View)

        Parameters:
        r1 - - contains all the Room information
        input - - Specified the Wifi Enabled Input
        inputS - - Specified the Smoked Allowed Input
        rt - - Specified the Room Type
        bt - - Specified the Bed Type
        fv - - Specified the Facing View

        public static void displayAllVacantRoomDetails​(Room ca,

                                               int n)

        displayAllVacantRoomDetails

        public static void displayAllVacantRoomDetails(Room ca, String input, String inputS, String rt, String bt, String fv, int n)

        This method display all vacant room details except room status(Room Number, Room type, WeekdayRate, WeekendRate, Wifi Enabled, Smoked Allowed, Bed Type, Facing View)

        Parameters:
        ca - - contains all the Room information
        input - - Specified the Wifi Enabled Input
        inputS - - Specified the Smoked Allowed Input
        rt - - Specified the Room Type
        bt - - Specified the Bed Type
        fv - - Specified the Facing View
        n - - Specified the Index Number
